%+n%% to the character's chance of being assassinated
Enables railways
In recognition of your military endeavours the Emperor has decreed that you shall bear His divine banner into battle. None shall dare resist the Imperial army!
All forces loyal to the Emperor have rallied behind you! The unification of Japan in the Emperor's name is yours to achieve.
You do not need to crush the opposition. If you continue to spread pro-Imperial influence, rival domains will realise the futility of resistance and join your side.
The war rages on between the Emperor and Shogun. Your efforts have not gone unnoticed, so expect mounting hostility from all, even your closest allies.
Imperial and Shogunate-related units and agents may no longer be fielded. Any such units you do control will now abandon your cause.
Your propaganda network must be rebuilt to accommodate your new personal objectives.
You no longer have access to shinsengumi and ishin shishi agents. However, your new propaganda allows you to maintain influence within your own and neighbouring provinces.
In recognition of your military endeavours the Shogun has decreed that you shall carry his banner before your armies. No one will stand before might of the Shogunate!
All who are loyal to the Shogun have rallied behind you. The unification of Japan in the Shogun’s name is now your only task.
You do not need to exterminate all opposition. Continue to spread pro-Shogunate influence. Rival domains will see that their resistance is pointless, and flock to your banner.
